verses.verse: The king <WH4428> rejoices <WH8055> in your strength, <WH5797> Yahweh! <WH3068> How greatly <WH3966> he rejoices <WH1523> in your salvation! <WH3444>
You have given <WH5414> him his heart <WH3820>'s desire, <WH8378> and have not withheld <WH4513> the request <WH782> of his lips. <WH8193> Selah. <WH5542>
For you meet <WH6923> him with the blessings <WH1293> of goodness. <WH2896> You set <WH7896> a crown <WH5850> of fine gold <WH6337> on his head. <WH7218>
He asked <WH7592> life <WH2416> of you, <WH5414> you gave it to him, <WH753> even length of days <WH3117> forever <WH5769> and ever. <WH5703>
His glory <WH3519> is great <WH1419> in your salvation. <WH3444> You lay <WH7737> honor <WH1935> and majesty on him. <WH1926>
For you make <WH7896> him most blessed <WH1293> forever. <WH5703> You make <WH7896> him glad <WH8057> with joy in your presence. <WH6440>
For the king <WH4428> trusts <WH982> in Yahweh. <WH3068> Through the loving kindness <WH2617> of the Most High, <WH5945> he shall not be moved. <WH4131>
Your hand <WH3027> will find out <WH4672> all of your enemies. <WH341> Your right hand <WH3225> will find out <WH4672> those who hate you. <WH8130>

You will make <WH7896> them as a fiery <WH784> furnace <WH8574> in the time <WH6256> of your anger. <WH6440> Yahweh <WH3068> will swallow them up <WH1104> in his wrath. <WH639> The fire <WH784> shall devour them. <WH398>
You will destroy <WH6> their descendants <WH6529> from the earth, <WH776> their posterity <WH2233> from among the children <WH1121> of men. <WH120>
For they intended <WH5186> evil <WH7451> against you. <WH2803> They plotted evil <WH4209> against you which cannot succeed. <WH3201>
For you will make <WH7896> them turn their back, <WH7926> when you aim <WH3559> drawn bows <WH4340> at their face. <WH6440>
Be exalted, <WH7311> Yahweh, <WH3068> in your strength, <WH5797> so we will sing <WH7891> and praise <WH2167> your power. <WH1369>
